name: On-Call Hero
description:
## EVERYBODY NEEDS A HERO SOMETIME…

Look, even experienced shadowrunning teams can find themselves in over their heads from time to time. Bad intel, a missing target, a hardened building, unexpected reinforcements — the list of things that can frag up a runner’s day is endless.

But the very best runners plan for these events, and have backup plans besides… and have backup plans for their backup plans… Runners like Ms. Myth, who, when facing a superior enemy force in a tactically-disadvantageous position, with half her team down and the other half about to be overrun, knows exactly who to call in to even the odds…
